org.apache.ambari.server.serveraction.upgrades

Class AbstractUpgradeServerAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.serveraction.AbstractServerAction
      • org.apache.ambari.server.serveraction.upgrades.AbstractUpgradeServerAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerAction
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddComponentAction, AutoSkipFailedSummaryAction, ConfigureAction, DeleteUnsupportedServicesAndComponents, FinalizeUpgradeAction, KerberosKeytabsAction, ManualStageAction, PluginUpgradeServerAction, PreconfigureKerberosAction, UpdateDesiredRepositoryAction, UpgradeUserKerberosDescriptor, YarnNodeManagerCapacityCalculation

    public abstract class AbstractUpgradeServerAction
extends AbstractServerAction
    Abstract class that reads values from command params in a consistent way.
